attributes.action: Stop giving tax-payers' money to the Terrence Higgins Trust
attributes.additional_details:
The Terrence Higgins Trust has received funding from the British government. The trust's activities include providing health advice targeted at older teenagers.  There has has been severe criticism of some of the advice offered, and of the content of websites published by the trust or delivering its content.

Funding for the trust has been provided by at least two government departments, Health and Education.  This petition is for people to sign, if they would like to see the government discontinuing its financial support for the Terrence Higgins Trust.  A complete withdrawal of government funding for the Terrence Higgins Trust is action that those signing this petition want the government to take.
